summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5862 for the construction of A trunk and lateral sewer together with a storm water overflow, known as the 40th Avenue Northeast, et al., Trunk and Lateral Sewer System under Ordinance No. 77242 as amended by Ordinance No. 77334, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
